attributes.action: arrest, charge and try Sir Fred Goodwin with high treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering the singular damage done to the nations banking industry and growing public unrest at the theft of £16 million of taxpayers money disguised as an early personnel pension plan pot. We the law abiding, hardworking, honest taxpaying public, demand legal action against this repugnant individual on the grounds of crimes against the people for which there can only be one charge, TREASON.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
